title: Modern Velvet Armchair
description: Sink into luxurious comfort with this stylish velvet armchair. Its sleek design and plush cushioning make it the perfect addition to any living room or reading nook. Available in a variety of rich colors.

title: Rustic Oak Dining Table
description: Gather around this beautifully crafted solid oak dining table. Its natural wood grain and sturdy construction create a warm and inviting atmosphere for family meals and gatherings. Seats 6-8 people.

title: Woven Rattan Garden Lounge Set
description: Create your perfect outdoor oasis with this elegant rattan lounge set. Includes a comfortable sofa, two armchairs, and a coffee table with a tempered glass top. Weather-resistant and stylish.

additional_info.material: PE Rattan, Powder-coated Steel Frame, Polyester Cushions

title: Industrial Style Bookshelf
description: Organize your books and display your decor with this trendy industrial-style bookshelf. Featuring sturdy metal shelves and a minimalist design, it's perfect for lofts, offices, or living rooms.

title: Ergonomic Office Chair
description: Boost your productivity with this comfortable and supportive ergonomic office chair. Features adjustable height, lumbar support, and breathable mesh back for all-day comfort.

title: Folding Camping Chair
description: Lightweight and portable, this folding camping chair is perfect for outdoor adventures, picnics, and relaxing in the garden. Folds flat for easy storage and transport.

title: Scandinavian Style Bed Frame
description: Embrace minimalist elegance with this Scandinavian-inspired bed frame. Its clean lines and natural wood finish create a serene and stylish bedroom atmosphere. Mattress not included.

title: Small Wooden Side Table
description: A versatile and charming small wooden side table, perfect for holding drinks, lamps, or decorative items next to your sofa or bed. Its simple design complements any decor.

title: Outdoor Patio Umbrella
description: Stay cool and shaded on sunny days with this large patio umbrella. Features a durable canopy and a sturdy pole. Easy to open and close.

title: Modern TV Stand with Storage
description: This sleek and modern TV stand offers ample storage space for your media devices, consoles, and accessories. Features a clean design with push-to-open doors.
